description.en:
Addon to UniversalAutoload to add support for a large selection of Modhub vehicles. This mod adds configurations for many popular Modhub vehicles and trailers.
Currently Supported: - FS22_20ftGooseneck - FS22_2PTS_6 - FS22_2PTS_6_console - FS22_Fliegl_SDS350J - FS22_Krone_Profi_Liner_HD - FS22_Profi_Liner_Flatbed - FS22_JohnDeere_Gator_Pack - FS22_selfMadeTrailer - FS22_reischPack - FS22_JoskinWagoLoader - FS22_TLX2020_Series - FS22_smallComboTrailer - FS22_lizardCarTrailer - FS22_strautmannSEK802 - FS22_strautmannSZK802 - FS22_lindnerUnitrac122LDrive - FS22_allPurposeTool - FS22_Bailey_Bale_Pallet_Trailer - FS22_Brantner_DD_24073 - FS22_DPW_1800 - FS22_flieglDPW180 - FS22_flieglDPWpack - FS22_flieglFlatbed - FS22_Hw80_pack - FS22_LizardSantana88 - FS22_Lizard_Selfmade_Tow_Truck - FS22_PerardPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_PongePack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_RollandPack (only flatbed trailers) - More to come!
description.de:
Erweiterung für Universal Autoload. Dieser Mod fügt Autoload Konfigurationen für viele beliebte Modhub Fahrzeuge und Anhänger hinzu.
Momentan unterstützt: - FS22_20ftGooseneck - FS22_2PTS_6 - FS22_2PTS_6_console - FS22_Fliegl_SDS350J - FS22_Krone_Profi_Liner_HD - FS22_Profi_Liner_Flatbed - FS22_JohnDeere_Gator_Pack - FS22_selfMadeTrailer - FS22_reischPack - FS22_JoskinWagoLoader - FS22_TLX2020_Series - FS22_smallComboTrailer - FS22_lizardCarTrailer - FS22_strautmannSEK802 - FS22_strautmannSZK802 - FS22_lindnerUnitrac122LDrive - FS22_allPurposeTool - FS22_Bailey_Bale_Pallet_Trailer - FS22_Brantner_DD_24073 - FS22_DPW_1800 - FS22_flieglDPW180 - FS22_flieglDPWpack - FS22_flieglFlatbed - FS22_Hw80_pack - FS22_LizardSantana88 - FS22_Lizard_Selfmade_Tow_Truck - FS22_PerardPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_PongePack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_RollandPack (only flatbed trailers) - Bald noch mehr!
